detail_desc: Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Long dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, wrapover front, slit at the back and tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slippers with elastication around the opening, soft fabric linings and insoles and soft imitation leather soles.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless nursing top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a broderie anglaise frill trim over the shoulders. Double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons at the top. Draped cap sleeves, covered elastication at the back, and sewn-in ties at the sides. Lined.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short, puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with long sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Joggers in airy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Hand-made, multi-strand necklace with glass and metal beads. Adjustable length 51-58 cm.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length dress in satin with a collar, buttons at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with narrow, contrasting colour shoulder straps that cross at the back. Decorative gathers at the top and a seam at the waist with a wide flounce.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sturdy, patterned jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.
Coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and wide, gently tapered sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in imitation suede with decorative metal details on the front of the waistband, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leather ankle boots with a zip at one side, an elastic gore and adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the other, and a loop at the back. Suede linings and cotton canvas insoles.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Waist with elastication at the back and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides. Zip fly and press-studs, zipped front pockets and snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tube scarf in a soft, glittery cable knit containing some wool.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a round hem and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Quilted top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a terry motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and elasticated ankle straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Hi-tops in mesh and scuba fabric with lacing at the front and loops front and back. EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit top in soft wool jersey with long sleeves, press-studs at the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

A covering colour to keep your trainers sparklingly white and fresh. Protects against UV-related discolouration. Bottle with a practical sponge applicator for ease of application. 100 ml. Instructions: First, clean your trainers. Then shake the bottle before use and apply to a dry surface. Air-dry. For leather trainers, you can polish to a fine shine.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with a high waist with covered elastication and an underskirt.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with rubber toe caps, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front of two flamingos with feathers that turn into tulle flounces on the sides of the swimsuit.
Scarf in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front, a grosgrain trim around the top and an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with gathers at the shoulders to create a puff effect. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a soft, fine cotton knit with a gathered seam at the waist, flared skirt and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Trainers in imitation leather with decorative seams, lacing at the front and a padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with flounced tiers and covered elastication at the waist.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Patterned handkerchief in mulberry silk. Size 33x33 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the front and long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with pleats at the shoulders and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short, wide sleeves and smocking at the back of the hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Swim top and trousers in UV-protective fabric. Top with a small collar, long sleeves and flounced hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist. UPF 50.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Wide-fitting blouse in plumeti chiffon with a small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in jersey with an asymmetric neckline and long sleeves.
Weekend bag in nylon with two imitation leather handles and a zip and drawstring at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 20x35x45 cm.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, diagonal zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring partially covered in imitation leather at the front. Adjustable shoulder strap and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 8x21.5x29 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Ribbed shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
